#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		char a[1000];
		scanf("%s",a);
		int lena=strlen(a);
		char b[100];
		strcpy(b,a);
		sort(a,a+lena);
		int found1=0;
		for(int i=0;i<lena;i++)
		{
			if(b[i]!=a[i])
				found1=1;
		}
		int found2=0;
		for(int i=0;i<lena;i++)
		{
			if(b[i]!=a[lena-1-i])
				found2=1;
		}
		if(found1==0||found2==0)
		{
			cout<<0<<endl;
		}
		else
			cout<<1<<endl;


	}

}
